sentences.english: Circulated air design keeps shower area clean in non-shower state.

sentences.english: Put the fire on lee side, with relative wind abeam.
sentences.chinese: 置火于下风舷，并使船侧受风。

sentences.english: As for Yahoo, it's throwing in the towel on search.
sentences.chinese: 对雅虎来说，它这是在搜索业务上甘拜下风了。

sentences.english: I have got the wind up about him have a car accident.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须转而驶向下风，风太大了。

sentences.english: I've really got to hand it to you.
The leading boat fell off when the wind grew too strong.
sentences.chinese: 风吹得太猛时，领头的船转向了下风。

sentences.english: Warnings were issued to people living downwind of the fire to stay indoors.
sentences.chinese: 已经向住在火势下风处的人们发出不要出门的警告。

sentences.english: Yunshu cigarette test arms, was the message the next month before the wind.
sentences.chinese: 云舒烟卷试怀抱，月下风前得消息。

sentences.english: Downswings are especially difficult to recover from because there are multiple forces working against you.
sentences.chinese: 下风期极难恢复，因为有多种力量对你施压。

sentences.english: You cheer for the same losing football team.
sentences.chinese: 你们为同一支落了下风的橄榄球队加油鼓气。

sentences.english: Careless steering brought the wind by the lee.
sentences.chinese: 不经心的驾驶使风吹到帆的下风面来了。

sentences.english: I never felt we were dominated physically.
sentences.chinese: 我从未觉得我们在身体对抗上落下风。
保证下风处的窗口通风。

sentences.english: When you are a newcomer at work, you are at a disadvantage.
sentences.chinese: 在工作中，你是新来的，你就处于下风。

sentences.english: However, it notes private security forces remain outgunned.
sentences.chinese: 不过，调查报告指出，私人保安部队仍处于下风。

sentences.english: PG is in a dominant position in the market of the daily chemical products. ;
sentences.chinese: 宝洁公司在日用化工产物市场上处下风地位。
